newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia tin down one cent to 14.49 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia tin down one cent to 14.49 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell one cent to close at 14.49 ringgit ($5.85) a kg after sellers outnumbered buyers despite overnight gains on the London Metal Exchange (LME), dealers said.
"The market is still steady as a one cent fall means the market is virtually unchanged," said a dealer.
There were initial bids for 101 tonnes against offers for 111. Final turnover was 101 tonnes compared to 95 on Monday.
Buyers were Europeans and locals. The premium against London market narrowed to $25 from $40 previously.
